LiveCycle maven plugin
Last Published: 2013-04-05  | Version: 2.0-SNAPSHOT
LiveCycle maven plugin
Project Documentation
  • Project Information
  • Project Reports

livecycle:generate-component-xml

Full name:

be.idamediafoundry.sofa.livecycle:livecycle-maven-plugin:2.0-SNAPSHOT:generate-component-xml

Description:

Mojo to generate a component XML file from java source code.

Attributes:

  • Requires a Maven project to be executed.
  • Binds by default to the lifecycle phase: process-resources.

Required Parameters

Name Type Since Description
host String - The host name/IP address of the destination LiveCycle server.
password String - The password used to login to the source LiveCycle server.
port String - The port number of the destination LiveCycle server.
protocol String - The protocol which should be used to communicate with the destination LiveCycle server. This can be EJB of SOAP.
Default value is: SOAP.
username String - The user name used to login to the destination LiveCycle server.

Optional Parameters

Name Type Since Description
componentFile File - The component xml file which will be written.
Default value is: ${project.build.outputDirectory}/component.xml.
informationType String - The type of information the plugin should look for in the source code. Supported types:
  • annotations
  • doclets
In order to use the annotations, you should include the livecycle-annotations-api artifact and annotate your classes!
Default value is: annotations.
originalComponentFile File - The component xml file which will be written.
Default value is: ${basedir}/src/main/resources/component.xml.
sourcePath String - The source path of the java code forming your DSC component. Each public non-abstract class will be configured as a service within your component.
Default value is: ${basedir}/src/main/java.

Parameter Details

componentFile:

The component xml file which will be written.
  • Type: java.io.File
  • Required: No
  • Expression: ${liveCycle.dsc.component.file}
  • Default: ${project.build.outputDirectory}/component.xml

host:

The host name/IP address of the destination LiveCycle server.
  • Type: java.lang.String
  • Required: Yes
  • Expression: ${liveCycle.host}

informationType:

The type of information the plugin should look for in the source code. Supported types:
  • annotations
  • doclets
In order to use the annotations, you should include the livecycle-annotations-api artifact and annotate your classes!
  • Type: java.lang.String
  • Required: No
  • Expression: ${liveCycle.dsc.component.informationType}
  • Default: annotations

originalComponentFile:

The component xml file which will be written.
  • Type: java.io.File
  • Required: No
  • Expression: ${liveCycle.dsc.original.component.file}
  • Default: ${basedir}/src/main/resources/component.xml

password:

The password used to login to the source LiveCycle server.
  • Type: java.lang.String
  • Required: Yes
  • Expression: ${liveCycle.password}

port:

The port number of the destination LiveCycle server.
  • Type: java.lang.String
  • Required: Yes
  • Expression: ${liveCycle.port}

protocol:

The protocol which should be used to communicate with the destination LiveCycle server. This can be EJB of SOAP.
  • Type: java.lang.String
  • Required: Yes
  • Expression: ${liveCycle.protocol}
  • Default: SOAP

sourcePath:

The source path of the java code forming your DSC component. Each public non-abstract class will be configured as a service within your component.
  • Type: java.lang.String
  • Required: No
  • Expression: ${liveCycle.dsc.component.sourcePath}
  • Default: ${basedir}/src/main/java

username:

The user name used to login to the destination LiveCycle server.
  • Type: java.lang.String
  • Required: Yes
  • Expression: ${liveCycle.username}
